images.alt:
A prime truck asks:

Is *Now* a Good Time?

I personally think no.  It's a pretty bad time.  Ask anyone in a city under siege.  Ask anyone laid off in the past year.

Ask anyone, and my guess is 9/10 would say "Now" is not a good time.

ðŸ«‚ To anyone else having a bad time.

record.text:
Especially given the layoffs today, someone at #Amazon marketing should probably rethink the marketing phrases on the trucks.

"Is Now A Good Time?"

ðŸ¤·ðŸ¤¦

No, it is not.

People getting murdered for protesting, economic upheaval, and a regime that resembles a bundle of sticks.

Not a good time.
